entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023
